CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Enable AI
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Enables AI so the player can play against a computer enemy.

ListPreference.android:title: Dice to Roll
ListPreference.android:summary: Sets the number of times the AI will roll per turn

ListPreference.android:title: AI Max Turn Score
ListPreference.android:summary: Sets the maximum score the AI can reach before ending its turn
